mapper.select: select MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_NAME, CMT_CONTENT, CMT_DATE, CMT_WORK from COMMENTS C INNER JOIN WORK W on (C.CMT_WORK = W.WORK_ID) inner join WORK_MEMBER WM on (W.WORK_ID = WM.WORK_ID) inner join PROJECT_MEMBER PM on (WM.PMEMBER_ID = PM.PMEMBER_ID) inner join member M on (CMT_MEMBER= M.MEMBER_MAIL) where W.WORK_PROJECT = #{work_project} order by to_number(CMT_ID) desc
